title: Master Combat Achievements

properties.name: description
properties.value: Master Combat Achievements tasks require the highest combat levels, the best equipment available, and advanced knowledge of a bosses mechanics, with the ability to skillfully kill said bosses and deal with their mechanics with precision, especially within raids.

content:
Master Combat Achievements tasks require the highest combat levels, the best equipment available, and advanced knowledge of a bosses mechanics, with the ability to skillfully kill said bosses and deal with their mechanics with precision, especially within raids.

Contents

  • 1 Requirements
  • 2 Tasks
  • 3 Rewards

Requirements[edit | edit source]

Items
  • Brittle key to access the Grotesque Guardians
  • Any chinchompa to complete Precise Positioning
  • Dark totem for every kill attempt at Skotizo
  • Hespori seed for every successful kill at Hespori
Skills
  • 70 Agility(not boostable) to enter Saradomin's Encampment
  • 65 Farming to access Hespori
  • 70 Ranged(not boostable) to enter Armadyl's Eyrie
  • 95 Slayer(not boostable)
Quests
  • Dragon Slayer II
  • The Frozen Door
  • Partial completion of Regicide to access Zulrah
  • Song of the Elves

Tasks[edit | edit source]

There are a total of 101 master-tier tasks for the Combat Achievements system.

Monster Name Description Category
Alchemical Hydra Working Overtime Kill the Alchemical Hydra 15 times without leaving the room. Stamina
Alchemical Hydra Alchemical Speed-Chaser Kill the Alchemical Hydra in less than 1 minute 45 seconds. Speed
Alchemical Hydra Alcleanical Hydra Kill the Alchemical Hydra without taking any damage. Perfection
Alchemical Hydra The Flame Skipper Kill the Alchemical Hydra without letting it spawn a flame wall attack. Mechanical
Alchemical Hydra Mixing Correctly Kill the Alchemical Hydra without empowering it. Mechanical
Alchemical Hydra Don't Flame Me Kill the Alchemical Hydra without being hit by the flame wall attack. Mechanical
Alchemical Hydra Lightning Lure Kill the Alchemical Hydra without being hit by the lightning attack. Mechanical
Alchemical Hydra Unrequired Antipoisons Kill the Alchemical Hydra without being hit by the acid pool attack. Mechanical
Alchemical Hydra Alchemical Master Kill the Alchemical Hydra 150 times. Kill count
Cerberus Arooo No More Kill Cerberus without any of the Summoned Souls being spawned. Mechanical
Cerberus Cerberus Master Kill Cerberus 150 times. Kill count
Chambers of Xeric Chambers of Xeric (Trio) Speed-Chaser Complete a Chambers of Xeric (Trio) in less than 16 minutes and 30 seconds. Speed
Chambers of Xeric Chambers of Xeric (5-Scale) Speed-Chaser Complete a Chambers of Xeric (5-scale) in less than 15 minutes. Speed
Chambers of Xeric Chambers of Xeric (Solo) Speed-Chaser Complete a Chambers of Xeric (Solo) in less than 21 minutes. Speed
Chambers of Xeric Blind Spot Kill Tekton without taking any damage. Perfection
Chambers of Xeric Perfect Olm (Trio) Kill the Great Olm in a trio raid without any team member taking damage from any of the following: Teleport portals, Fire Walls, Healing pools, Crystal Bombs, Crystal Burst or Prayer Orbs. You also cannot let his claws regenerate or take damage from the same acid pool back to back. Perfection
Chambers of Xeric Perfect Olm (Solo) Kill the Great Olm in a solo raid without taking damage from any of the following: Teleport portals, Fire Walls, Healing pools, Crystal Bombs, Crystal Burst or Prayer Orbs. You also cannot let his claws regenerate or take damage from the same acid pool back to back. Perfection
Chambers of Xeric Playing with Lasers Clear the Crystal Crabs room without wasting an orb after the first crystal has been activated. Perfection
Chambers of Xeric Undying Raider Complete a Chambers of Xeric solo raid without dying. Perfection
Chambers of Xeric Anvil No More Kill Tekton before he returns to his anvil for a second time after the fight begins. Mechanical
Chambers of Xeric Stop Drop and Roll Kill Vasa Nistirio before he performs his teleport attack for the second time. Mechanical
Chambers of Xeric A Not So Special Lizard Kill the Great Olm in a solo raid without letting him use any of the following special attacks in his second to last phase: Crystal Burst, Lightning Walls, Teleportation Portals or left-hand autohealing. Mechanical
Chambers of Xeric Putting It Olm on the Line Complete a Chambers of Xeric solo raid with more than 40,000 points. Mechanical
Chambers of Xeric No Time for Death Clear the Tightrope room without killing any Deathly Mages or Deathly Rangers. Mechanical
Chambers of Xeric Chambers of Xeric Master Complete the Chambers of Xeric 75 times. Kill count
Chambers of Xeric (CM) Chambers of Xeric: CM (Trio) Speed-Chaser Complete a Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode (Trio) in less than 35 minutes. Speed
Chambers of Xeric (CM) Chambers of Xeric: CM (5-Scale) Speed-Chaser Complete a Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode (5-scale) in less than 30 minutes. Speed
Chambers of Xeric (CM) Chambers of Xeric: CM (Solo) Speed-Chaser Complete a Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode (Solo) in less than 45 minutes. Speed
Chambers of Xeric (CM) Immortal Raider Complete a Chambers of Xeric Challenge mode (Solo) raid without dying. Perfection
Chambers of Xeric (CM) Immortal Raid Team Complete a Chambers of Xeric: Challenge mode raid without anyone dying. Perfection
Chambers of Xeric (CM) Chambers of Xeric: CM Master Complete the Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode 10 times. Kill count
Commander Zilyana Moving Collateral Kill Commander Zilyana in a private instance without attacking her directly. Restriction
Corporeal Beast Corporeal Beast Master Kill the Corporeal Beast 50 times. Kill count
The Corrupted Gauntlet Corrupted Gauntlet Speed-Chaser Complete a Corrupted Gauntlet in less than 7 minutes and 30 seconds. Speed
The Corrupted Gauntlet Corrupted Warrior Kill the Corrupted Hunllef with a full set of perfected corrupted armour equipped. Restriction
The Corrupted Gauntlet Defence Doesn't Matter II Kill the Corrupted Hunllef without making any armour within the Corrupted Gauntlet. Restriction
The Corrupted Gauntlet Perfect Corrupted Hunllef Kill the Corrupted Hunllef without taking damage from: Tornadoes, Damaging Floor or Stomp Attacks. Also, do not take damage off prayer and do not attack the Corrupted Hunleff with the wrong weapon. Perfection
The Corrupted Gauntlet Corrupted Gauntlet Master Complete the Corrupted Gauntlet 10 times. Kill count
Fight Caves Fight Caves Speed-Chaser Complete the Fight Caves in less than 30 minutes. Speed
Fight Caves You Didn't Say Anything About a Bat Complete the Fight Caves without being attacked by a Tz-Kih. Mechanical
Fight Caves Denying the Healers Complete the Fight caves without letting any of the Yt-MejKot heal. Mechanical
Fight Caves Fight Caves Master Complete the Fight Caves 5 times. Kill count
The Gauntlet Gauntlet Speed-Chaser Complete the Gauntlet in less than 5 minutes. Speed
The Gauntlet Defence Doesn't Matter Kill the Crystalline Hunllef without making any armour within the Gauntlet. Restriction
The Gauntlet Perfect Crystalline Hunllef Kill the Crystalline Hunllef without taking damage from: Tornadoes, Damaging Floor or Stomp Attacks. Also, do not take damage off prayer and do not attack the Crystalline Hunleff with the wrong weapon. Perfection
The Gauntlet Gauntlet Master Complete the Gauntlet 20 times. Kill count
Grotesque Guardians ... 'til Dawn Kill the Grotesque Guardians 20 times without leaving the instance. Stamina
Grotesque Guardians Grotesque Guardians Speed-Chaser Kill the Grotesque Guardians in less than 1:40 minutes. Speed
Grotesque Guardians Perfect Grotesque Guardians II Kill the Grotesque Guardians 5 times in a row whilst completing the Perfect Grotesque Guardians task every time. Perfection
Hespori Hespori Speed-Chaser Kill the Hespori in less than 36 seconds. Speed
Inferno Nibblers, Begone! Kill Tzkal-Zuk without letting a pillar fall before wave 67. Perfection
Kraken One Hundred Tentacles Kill the Kraken 100 times in a private instance without leaving the room. Stamina
Kree'arra Swoop No More Kill Kree'arra in a private instance without taking any melee damage from the boss or his bodyguards. Perfection
Kree'arra Collateral Damage Kill Kree'arra in a private instance without ever attacking him directly. Mechanical
Nex Nex Master Kill Nex 25 times. Kill count
Nex A siphon will solve this Kill Nex without letting her heal from her Blood Siphon special attack. Mechanical
Nex Contain this! Kill Nex without anyone taking damage from any Ice special attack. Mechanical
Nex There is no escape! Kill Nex without anyone being hit by the Smoke Dash special attack. Mechanical
Nex Nex Trio Kill Nex with three or less players at the start of the fight. Restriction
Nex Shadows Move... Kill Nex without anyone being hit by the Shadow Smash attack. Mechanical
The Nightmare Nightmare (5-Scale) Speed-Chaser Defeat the Nightmare (5-scale) in less than 4 minutes. Speed
The Nightmare Nightmare (Solo) Speed-Chaser Defeat the Nightmare (Solo) in less than 19 minutes. Speed
The Nightmare Perfect Nightmare Kill the Nightmare without any player taking damage from the following attacks: Nightmare rifts, an un-cured parasite explosion, Corpse flowers or the Nightmare's Surge. Also, no player can take damage off prayer or have their attacks slowed by the Nightmare spores. Perfection
The Nightmare Nightmare Master Kill The Nightmare 50 times. Kill count
Phosani's Nightmare Phosani's Master Kill Phosani's Nightmare 5 times. Kill count
Phosani's Nightmare Crush Hour Kill Phosani's Nightmare while killing every parasite and husk in one hit. Mechanical
Phosani's Nightmare I Would Simply React Kill Phosani's Nightmare without allowing your prayer to be disabled. Mechanical
Phosani's Nightmare Dreamland Express Kill Phosani's Nightmare without a sleepwalker reaching her during her desperation phase. Mechanical
Phosani's Nightmare Phosani's Speedchaser Defeat Phosani's Nighmare within 9 minutes. Speed
Skotizo Precise Positioning Kill Skotizo with the final source of damage being a Chinchompa explosion. Restriction
Theatre of Blood Theatre (5-Scale) Speed-Chaser Complete the Theatre of Blood (5-scale) in less than 16 minutes. Speed
Theatre of Blood Theatre (4-Scale) Speed-Chaser Complete the Theatre of Blood (4-scale) in less than 17 minutes. Speed
Theatre of Blood Theatre (Trio) Speed-Chaser Complete the Theatre of Blood (Trio) in less than 20 minutes. Speed
Theatre of Blood Back in My Day... Complete the Theatre of Blood without any member of the team equipping a Scythe of Vitur. Restriction
Theatre of Blood Can You Dance? Kill Xarpus without anyone in the team using a ranged or magic weapon. Restriction
Theatre of Blood Can't Drain This Kill The Maiden of Sugadinti without anyone in the team losing any prayer points. Restriction
Theatre of Blood Perfect Verzik Defeat Verzik Vitur without anyone in the team taking damage from Verzik Vitur's attacks other than her spider form's correctly prayed against regular magical and ranged attacks. Perfection
Theatre of Blood Perfect Xarpus Kill Xarpus without anyone in the team taking any damage from Xarpus' attacks and without letting an exhumed heal Xarpus more than twice. Perfection
Theatre of Blood Perfect Sotesteg Kill Sotetseg without anyone in the team stepping on the wrong tile in the maze, without getting hit by the tornado and without taking any damage from Sotetseg's attacks whilst off prayer. Perfection
Theatre of Blood Perfect Nylocas Kill the Nylocas Vasilias without anyone in the team attacking any Nylocas with the wrong attack style, without letting a pillar collapse and without getting hit by any of the Nylocas Vasilias attacks whilst off prayer. Perfection
Theatre of Blood Perfect Bloat Kill the Pestilent Bloat without anyone in the team taking damage from the following sources: Pestilent flies, Falling body parts or The Pestilent Bloats stomp attack. Perfection
Theatre of Blood Perfect Maiden Kill The Maiden of Sugadinti without anyone in the team taking damage from the following sources: Blood Spawn projectiles and Blood Spawn trails. Also, without taking damage off prayer and without letting any of the Nylocas Matomenos heal The Maiden. Perfection
Theatre of Blood A Timely Snack Kill Sotetseg after surviving at least 3 ball attacks without sharing the damage and without anyone dying throughout the fight. Mechanical
Theatre of Blood Pop It Kill Verzik without any Nylocas being frozen and without anyone taking damage from the Nylocas. Mechanical
Theatre of Blood Two-Down Kill the Pestilent Bloat before he shuts down for the third time. Mechanical
Theatre of Blood Theatre of Blood Master Complete the Theatre of Blood 75 times. Kill count
Theatre of Blood (HM) Hard Mode? Completed It Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode within the challenge time. Speed
Theatre of Blood (Entry) Theatre of Blood: SM Speed-Chaser Complete the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode in less than 17 minutes. Speed
TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges Multi-Style Specialist Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's third challenge while using a different attack style for each JalTok-Jad. Mechanical
TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges Supplies? Who Needs 'em? Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's third challenge without having anything in your inventory. Perfection
TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges Facing Jad Head-on IV Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's fourth challenge with only melee. Restriction
TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Speed-Chaser Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's third challenge in less than 3 minutes. Speed
TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges The IV Jad Challenge Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's fourth challenge. Kill count
Vorkath Extended Encounter Kill Vorkath 10 times without leaving his area. Stamina
Vorkath Vorkath Speed-Chaser Kill Vorkath in less than 1 minute and 15 seconds. Speed
Vorkath Dodging the Dragon Kill Vorkath 5 times without taking any damage from his special attacks and without leaving his area. Perfection
Vorkath The Walk Hit Vorkath 12 times during the acid special without getting hit by his rapid fire or the acid pools. Mechanical
Vorkath Vorkath Master Kill Vorkath 100 times. Kill count
Zulrah Zulrah Speed-Chaser Kill Zulrah in less than 1 minute, without a slayer task. Speed
Zulrah Perfect Zulrah Kill Zulrah whilst taking no damage from the following: Snakelings, Venom Clouds, Zulrah's Green or Crimson phase. Perfection
Zulrah Zulrah Master Kill Zulrah 150 times. Kill count

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • An antique lamp worth 35,000 experience in any skill above 60
  • Ghommal's hilt 5
    • Five daily teleports to Mor Ul Rek (within the inner city)
  • Like a boss slayer unlock will now allow players to have up to 46 boss kills (a +11 increase) when assigned a boss task
  • Slayer tasks to kill TzTok-Jad or TzKal-Zuk are increased to 2 kills per task
  • God Wars Dungeon benefits:
    • God Wars Dungeon boss entrances now require 33 follower kill count to enter instead of 36
    • Ecumenical key drop rate is now increased from 1/50 to 1/45
    • Coin cost for God Wars Dungeon private instances is reduced from 125,000 to 100,000 coins
  • Ghommal can make players a vampyric slayer helmet
